name: RegexGuardrail
description: Validates the request or response content against a regular expression pattern to ensure it contains a match. If no match is found, the guardrail intervenes and returns an error response.

policyAttributes.name: name
policyAttributes.description: The name of the guardrail policy. This will be used for tracking purposes.

policyAttributes.name: regex
policyAttributes.description: The regular expression used to validate the content.

policyAttributes.name: jsonPath
policyAttributes.description: The JSONPath expression used to extract content from the payload. If not specified, the entire payload will be used for validation.

policyAttributes.name: doInvert
policyAttributes.description: If enabled, inverts the guardrail blocking decision, causing the guardrail to intervene and return an error response when a match is found in the content.

policyAttributes.name: hideAssessment
policyAttributes.description: When enabled, the error response will omit detailed information about the reason for the guardrail intervention.
